short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LeapMax URL Tracker extends the productivity app by tracking the URLs a user visits.Requires LeapMax installed on the system.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LeapMax is a productivity tracking application. The purpose of this plugin is to extend LeapMax with the ability to keep track of which URL's a user is using on the web. This extension requires LeapMax app to be installed in the system
